abstract: The British-Dutch consumer products giant said on Thursday that it was considering selling its Skippy peanut butter brand in the United States and Canada as it focused more on emerging markets.
snippet: The British-Dutch consumer products giant said on Thursday that it was considering selling its Skippy peanut butter brand in the United States and Canada as it focused more on emerging markets.
lead_paragraph: Unilever continues to reduce its exposure to the West.

headline.main: Unilever Weighs a Sale of Skippy
